ComicInfo.Title: Apocalypse Soon
ComicInfo.Summary: A WORLD WAR HULK TIE-IN! Well, Johnny got what he wanted. Temporarily setting aside his quest for the remaining avatars of Lucifer, he has forced the Ghost Rider into a confrontation with The Hulk in hopes of saving the innocent. But whoâ€™s going to save Ghost Rider? The straight-up beat-down of the decade rumbles to its shocking conclusion!
